sub_title: PMO with a talent for transforming complex data into meaningful insights
summary:
Civil Engineering graduate with a passion for BI and data visualization. Experienced in leveraging Power BI to create insightful reports that drive decision-making in business development and project management. 

Excited about learning new technologies, recently completed SQL training, and currently developing Python skills. Seeking opportunities to apply my data analysis and BI expertise and contribute to driving business success through actionable insights.

As an individual highly driven by learning and challenging myself, I am eager to expand my knowledge and explore new technologies in the field of Business Intelligence.

https://patriciapires.github.io/

projects.title: ETL Pipeline and Data Visualization for Trading Card Game Analytics
projects.description:
Currently developing an end-to-end ETL pipeline in Python to extract and analyze combat logs from a trading card game simulator (OPTCG Simulator). Utilized Python for data extraction, transformation, and loading, while enhancing SQL skills for efficient data querying.
The next step will be to create an interactive online dashboard with visualizations to showcase key metrics such as win/loss ratio, success rate of specific leader cards, optimal card matchups, etc.

contributors.headline: PMO with a talent for transforming complex data into meaningful insights

projects.title: Ecovillage List
projects.description:
Ecovillagelist.com was a hackathon (Climate Fixathon) project that aimed to bring ecovillages closer to the climate concerned people by providing them with a responsible list of available ecovillages. This online tool listed a diverse number of ecovillages and sustainable communities spread around the world.
Responsible for filtering and for content related user stories.

contributors.headline: PMO with a talent for transforming complex data into meaningful insights

projects.title: Feasibility study of a Demand Reponsive Transport (DRT) in a rural area
projects.description:
The goal of this course project was to understand Demand Responsive Transport as a solution for rural areas and to elaborate a comparison study in order to assess the viability of a DRT system in a rural municipality in northern Portugal.
For this study, a municipality in Norway with a similar population density and area and another one in Portugal were used for comparison. Moreover, a SWOT analysis of the target municipality was done, taking as a support material a mobility study performed in the region.

contributors.headline: PMO with a talent for transforming complex data into meaningful insights

projects.title: Passenger flow study for a light railway system
projects.description:
The aim of this study was to perform a passenger flow analysis of the university campus area covered by Metro do Porto. Some field interviews were conducted, and alongside the official data provided by Metro do Porto, a study was performed.
A user profile was defined based on the data gathered and each station of the corresponding zone was studied in order to understand the peak hours and the user flows. A comparison was done with the data gathered from students of previous years, dating back to 2006.

contributors.headline: PMO with a talent for transforming complex data into meaningful insights

projects.title: Urban quality assessment and urban intervention proposal for a central city block
projects.description:
The aim of the proposed project is to expand the practical exercise of reading a city through analysis, discussions with different backgrounds and a diagnosis based on the assumption of improving the space for the city users.
The project consisted in analysing a block in the city of Porto, signaled by the municipality for a potential intervention to improve the urban quality of that area. A characterization of the area was made, as well as an acessibility and mobility analysis and the identification of important landmarks.
A preliminary program was proposed based on a diagnostic analysis according to the design qualities proposed in the book Responsive Environments (Bentley et al., 1985).

contributors.headline: PMO with a talent for transforming complex data into meaningful insights

projects.title: Planning and design of a residential neighbourhood
projects.description:
The goal of this project was to understand the morphology of a Slovenian residential area, as well as analysing the traffic infrastructure, green spaces and master and detailed plan of the city. The concept of a mental map was explored and experimented.
The project culminated with a housing design sketch using AutoCAD, taking into consideration all the points previously mentioned.

contributors.headline: PMO with a talent for transforming complex data into meaningful insights

projects.title: Road design proposal with 2 variants
projects.description: Designed 2 different variants of a municipal road in the rural town of Boticas in Portugal. Applied a generalized approach to the Portuguese regulations concerned with road design. The variants proposed for are aimed for local transit, but due to their location (peripheral), national roads criteria were adopted.

contributors.headline: PMO with a talent for transforming complex data into meaningful insights

projects.title: Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) of a new metro line
projects.description:
The aim of this project was to undertake a social and environmental impact assessment of a new subway line in the city of Porto, using the EIA method.
The study involved proposing new solutions for the road traffic foreseen during the construction phase, to indicate areas where noise impacts will be most important or high and to determine the appropriate areas for the location of the construction sites.
The tools used for assignment project were ArcGIS and ArcMAP.

profile_positions.description:
* Provide financial analysis and management support to delivery teams, including assistance with resource allocation and cost projections.
* Assist sales leadership teams by developing Power BI dashboards using Salesforces datasets. These dashboards offer a comprehensive overview of the sales pipeline, primarily focused on improving predictability.
profile_positions.title: PMO / BI Analyst

profile_positions.description:
I have worked closely with businesses in the AEC (Architecture, Engineering, and Construction) and MFG (Manufacturing) industries, aiding them in the successful acquisition and implementation of digitalization tools and methods within their organizations.

* Collaborating with businesses to develop strategies and projects aimed at expanding their presence in the French and Portuguese markets.
* Analyzing and adapting to the specific needs of French and Portuguese companies, assisting them in their journey towards digitization and the adoption of 3D methods and technologies.
* Attracting potential customers and providing guidance to help them effectively utilize their licensing options and find suitable solutions for their requirements.
* Managing contracts and licenses to ensure compliance and smooth operations.
* Conducting training sessions on the latest innovative design tools offered by Autodesk.
* Creating a PowerBI dashboard that enabled customers to gain valuable insights into their software usage, including identifying areas of underutilization and ensuring compliance with licensing agreements.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Representative

profile_positions.description:
InterAct Competence works to make differences strengthen companies and organization instead of leading to misunderstanding and conflict. It uses tailored training design and interactive methods to make a difference.
Creating audiovisual content for the company's social networks pages and website as an intern.
